channel.title: User on Hello!
channel.description: Recent content in User on Hello!

item.title: Recap Tackling Climate Change useR! 2020 breakout session
item.description: On Tuesday, July 7th I organized a breakout session Tackling Climate Change at a virtual useR!2020 Munich. When I submitted the proposal I hoped the session will be a mix of an invited talk, climate-related contributions submitted to the useR! and an open discussion between R users and researchers. In an online setup, the final session schedule was a bit different. The session lasted almost to 2 scheduled hours.
